member.summary:
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the help builder should verify that all args have the necessary information to display the help. Help information is stored in the metadata, and each help builder can use different metadata to display the help.
When this property is set to true, the method is called and if any necessary information is missing, an exception is thrown.
member.remarks: It is recommended to set this value to true in debug mode to ensure that no needed help information is unspecified. It is not recommended to use in release mode.
